title: Roku reportedly looking to make its own TVs, putting extra pressure on Google TVâ€™s growth
content:
The battle for growth in the smart TV market continues to heat up, with 2022 expected to be a key tipping point. At this point, it’s up to smart TVs to determine how the market will go, and it seems Roku is going all-in on that, with plans to make its own TVs.

more…

The post Roku reportedly looking to make its own TVs, putting extra pressure on Google TV’s growth appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: According to a new report, Roku has been working for over a year to build its own TV sets to sell alongside partners.
